name: miracle-hides-keys
description: create keys for symmetric and asymmetric encryption

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix helper && npm install --prefix src-client-es6 && npm install --prefix src-client-react && npm install --prefix src-scss && npm install --prefix src-selenium && npm install --prefix src-server-nest
scripts.predist: npm run install:all && npm run deploy:report
scripts.dist: npm run dist:nest && npm run dist:scss && npm run dist:es6 && npm run dist:react
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:es6 && npm run deploy:react && npm run deploy:scss:es6
scripts.postdeploy: ls -al src-server-nest/dist && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/es6 && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/react && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/react/static && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/react/static/css && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/react/static/js && ls -al src-server-nest/dist/client/react/static/media

author: Michael Diers
